DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate curative effect TCM multi-channel interventional therapy woman ART Failure ; compare curative effect dual therapy triple therapy woman ART Failure ; choose best TCM interventional therapeutic plan . Methods : The case ART Failure West China second University Hospital Sichuan University ( West China Women 's Children 's Hospital Sichuan University ) meeting inclusion criterion randomly divide three group : dual therapy group , triple therapy group control group , compare natural pregnancy number , condition period secondary IVF-ET improvement kidney deficiency , liver depression blood stasis syndrome among three group .
DOC.brief_title: Observing Curative Effect Assisted Reproduction TCM Multi-channel Interventional Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To evaluate curative effect TCM multi-channel interventional therapy woman ART Failure ; compare curative effect dual therapy triple therapy woman ART Failure ; choose best TCM interventional therapeutic plan . Methods : The case ART Failure West China second University Hospital Sichuan University ( West China Women 's Children 's Hospital Sichuan University ) meeting inclusion criterion randomly divide three group : dual therapy group , triple therapy group control group , compare natural pregnancy number , condition period secondary IVF-ET improvement kidney deficiency , liver depression blood stasis syndrome among three group . The result show effect TCM multi-channel interventional therapy patient ART failure
DOC.criteria: 1 . People age 20 45 2 . People IVF ET indication 3 . People Reproductive Center West China second University Hospital Sichuan University ( West China Women 's Children 's Hospital Sichuan University ) long plan IVE ET Failure accept secondary IVFET 4 . People conform standard syndrome differentiation TCM : kidney deficiency liver depression blood stasis 5 . People normal basic sex hormone level 6 . People recognize voluntarily sign informed consent . NOTICE : People conform 6 item include . 1 . People n't meet inclusion criterion 2 . The husband less sperm weak sperm seriously 3 . People drug allergy allergic constitution 4 . People serious primary disease cardiovascular , liver , kidney hematopoietic system , etc . And mentally disordered patient 5 . People complicate acute infectious disease organic disease 6 . People confirm diagnosis malformed reproductive organ , reproductive system inflammation tumor upon examination 7 . People suffer hereditary disease suitable fertility regulate `` maternal infant health care law '' 8 . People serious bad habit drug use 9 . People contact birth defect ray , poison , drug certain number effect ; NOTICE : People conform term 9 rule .
